text: Bruce Delavere (1908-1985) was an Australian rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s. A St. George Dragons lower grade player, Bruce Delavere played first grade in 1936, before retiring to a cricket and rugby league career on the N.S.W. south coast. Whiticker/Hudson "The Encyclopedia Of Rugby League Players" 1995 Edition, Bruce Delavere died on 18 November 1985 aged 77.Ancestry.com.au https://www.ancestry.com.au/family- tree/person/tree/68841186/person/360193941893/facts?_phsrc=gte2195&_phstart=successSource ==References== Category:St. George Dragons players Category:Australian rugby league players Category:1908 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Rugby league players from Sydney Category:Rugby league wingers
title: Bruce Delavere
